text: Lincoln City F.C. is an English football team currently playing in Football League one (the third tier of the English football league system). The team play at the 10,127 capacity Sincil Bank in Lincoln, Lincolnshire, and are nicknamed the Imps after the legend of the Lincoln Imp. More recently, they have also been known as the Red Imps. Traditionally they play in red and white striped shirts with black shorts and red and white socks. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Third Division 18th 2001/02 Third Division 22nd 2002/03 Third Division 6th 2003/04 Third Division 7th 2004/05 League Two 6th 2005/06 League Two 7th 2006/07 League Two 5th 2007/08 League Two 15th 2008/09 League Two 13th === Former position === Category:English football clubs Category:1884 establishments in England
title: Lincoln City F.C.
